answers.question: What kind of assistance is being offered?
answers.answer: The International Organization for Migration in Romania (IOM Romania) offers free medical care.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How can someone access these services?
answers.answer: To access these services, you must first make an appointment with the IOM representatives at their office located in RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: When are these services available?
answers.answer: These services are available Monday through Friday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: What medical services are provided?
answers.answer: Free consultations are provided by a family doctor, psychologist, and gynecologist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: Who is eligible for this assistance?
answers.answer: Ukrainians and refugees from other countries are eligible for this free medical care.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
